article: In a hall crowded with audience, a famous professor started his lecture by holding up aPS10 note.He asked, " _ is this piece of paper and is it worth anything?" "It's aPS10 note, which can be _ in markets for its value." replied one of the many participants who _ their hands. The speaker continued to crumple the PS10 note using both his _ until it became a piece of wrinkled paper.He then _ it again and made an unsuccessful attempt to keep it _ ,asking, "Does any one of you want it?"  "Yes!" replied the participants. "Well," he said, "it looks that I haven't done _ ! What if I do this?" And he _ it on the ground and started to grind it into the floor with his shoe.He picked up the note, and it was now all crumpled, dirty and not easy to _ from a distance."Now would someone still like to _ it for its value?'' Many hands went in the _ ."I think that piece of currency is still holding its value," _ a participant."This bill can still get _ worthPS10." said another participant.Everyone agreed. "My friend, there is a very valuable lesson in what we were just _ with.It might appear to some of you that I was able to change the PS10 note during the process, _ no matter what I did to this note, you still believe that my actions did not actually _ its value It was still a currency note worthPS10". Many times in our life, we are dropped and crumpled by the _ we make or the circumstances that come our way.We feel as though we are _ .But whatever has happened or what will happen, please remember you never lose your _ , you are still precious to those who love you.
